mdRecord.dcterms:description: Design has been attributed to Christopher Wren. [work]

In 1684 the house was completely rebuilt for [Colonel William] Freeman, a plantation and slave owner and merchant. ... Between 1764 and 1766 the grounds were dramatically landscaped ... by Capability Brown. Shortly thereafter the architect James Wyatt worked on decorations in new rooms in the house (1770â€“71). House extended 1883 by Lancaster architects Paley and Austin. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fawley_Court [work]
